description: seated man wearing a suite, hat, and glasses, with dark beard, left of center at bottom, with his PL hand under his chin and his PR hand on his PL elbow; two clusters of standing men in dark suites and hats in background at left and middle ground at right
inscription: verso in black ink: New York, interieur de synagogue à Brooklyn. / USA.2.2.5

title: Jewish man sitting, resting head on hand, Brooklyn, NY
